title: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems
description: When I launch the Help view, I need to first click on one of the "live" areas (such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working properly. Specifically, the tab key does not have any effect.
OB: When I launch the Help view on March 26, 2002, using Windows 2000, the tab key does not do anything.
SR: 1. Launch the Help view on March 26, 2002, using Windows 2000. 2. Observe that the tab key does not have any effect. 3. Click on one of the "live" areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) and observe if the tab key starts working.
